description:
Small edges and nasty smears are nothing these shoes can't handle. The updated Vapor V has a slightly stiffer midsole than the previous, providing a supportive platform for hard face and crack climbs. Scarpa's Bi-Tension system pulls power back from your toes rather than cramming your foot painfully forward, so you get more power with less tension on your foot.

  • Uppers are made of microsuede for comfort and long-lasting fit
  • Padded mesh tongue cushions feet on long multi-pitches and in cracks
  • Slightly asymmetric, curved shape for precise foot placement
  • 1.5mm Talyn midsole provides a supportive platform for edging and jamming
  • Sole is 3.5mm Vibram® XS Edge rubber grips small edges
  • Members typically downsize 1-1.5 sizes (performance fit) or 0.5-1 sizes (comfort fit) from their street shoe size
name: Scarpa Vapor V Rock Shoes - Men's
